channel.title: NK becoming King too often
channel.description: I've seen too many games where NK becomes king. Hell even I do it. It's the easiest way to win as NK, just kill the king and boom, BD loses a NK and gains a 100% neut king. I made this thread for possible suggestions and discussion

item.title: NK becoming King too often
item.dc:creator: psychoneirik
item.description:
I like this idea but it would be really easy to find the NK king if someone just asks him “Send a guard to protect me to prove you are not Psycho king”. I think the NK king should still have the guard ability and not be night immune, if he is afraid of being attacked at night he can just guard himself, and since he was the NK he can only be killed by the unseen/cult who don’t usually target king since he is usually protected.

Also this is a random suggestion but he could also have a different decide fate that has 2 uses instead of 1 but can only force executions, not pardons. The second charge would be very powerful but the king should be careful and not use it until the end since it basically outs him as psycho king.

Read full topic

item.title: NK becoming King too often
item.dc:creator: Vandalay
item.description:
Not to mention it also puts a crazy high risk on just becoming king as an NK… and a pretty funny NK strategy.

Step 1, Kill king
Step 2, don’t become king
Step 3, stop killing, let everyone notice the reaper/possesor has stopped acting
Step 4. Watch BD kill the new king.

Though I do agree with psycho there, he needs guards, Personally I’d say make him a regular king, with a kill all BD/Unseen/Cult goal.
